Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Ball \Ball\, v. i. [imp. & p. p. {Balled} (b[add]ld); p. pr. & vb. n. {Balling}.] To gather balls which cling to the feet, as of damp snow or clay; to gather into balls; as, the horse balls; the snow balls. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: balled \balled\ adj. prenom. formed or gathered into a ball. balled cotton [WordNet 1.5]
